## SinCos class

Generator of sine &amp; cosine values of given frequency in the form of \[sin,cos\] tuples. Start phase always zero.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SinCos extends AGen<number[]> implements IReset 
```

## Remarks

Implementation based on a self-oscillating SVF (state-variable filter) without using any trig functions. Therefore, \~30% faster, but precision only useful for very low (<!-- -->&lt; \~2Hz) frequencies. Due to floating point error accumulation, phase &amp; amplitude drift will occur for higher frequencies.

References: - http://www.earlevel.com/main/2003/03/02/the-digital-state-variable-filter/
